properties.areaDesc: Lowndes, AL; Montgomery, AL; Elmore, AL; Dallas, AL; Autauga, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 1:30PM CST until February 10 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Alabama River At Montgomery Affecting Autauga...Dallas...Elmore...
Lowndes and Montgomery Counties.

.Rises are continuing along the Alabama River following the recent
heavy rainfall...and a flood warning is now in effect for the
Alabama River at Montgomery.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Alabama River At Montgomery.
* from this evening to Monday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 12:00 PM Friday The stage Was 34.2 feet.
* Flood stage is 35 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by this evening and continue to
rise to near 35.8 feet by Saturday afternoon. The river will
fall below flood stage by Sunday evening.
* Impact...At 35 feet...Extensive flooding of low lands in the area
occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
